jump_scares.spoiler: Dean falls asleep and Freddy grabs him

Freddy jumps out at Kris in the attic

Kris lies back down on her bed but Freddy is lying there and says “found you”
Jesse jumps behind Nancy as she is painting
Quentin walks through the library and sees Freddy reading to kids. Freddy then spins around
Jesse gets attacked in his dream from behind
Freddy pulls Nancy out of the car
Freddy stands ahead of the car while Quentin is driving

Tina runs into Freddy

Freddy jumps out at Nancy from behind a bush

Freddy’s claw comes out of the bed
Freddy suddenly jumps out at Nancy

Freddy’s hand bursts through the door and grabs Nancy’s mother. [Video]
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face

jump_scares.spoiler: The window Kristen is looking out of suddenly shatters and sends her flying backwards
Kincaid calls out to his dog and it starts barking at him
Freddy suddenly slashes through the waterbed and grabs Joey
Something unexpectedly splashes loudly in the water
While smearing blood on the paper, Sheila’s arm is sucked into it
Freddy jumps up behind Alice and grabs her

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors

jump_scares.spoiler: Kristen backs into a corpse
Kristen grabs the tap handle which then wraps around her hand
Something pops up underneath the mat on the floor
A large worm-like creature lifts up through the floor underneath Kristen
Hands reach out of both sides of the TV
Neil steals a cross but is immediately grabbed on his shoulder by a hand
A claw suddenly rips through the wall after Nancy says “How do we find him Kristen?”
Kristen’s mother is pulled through the doorway
Taryn watches as a man walks past, she then spins around to see Freddy behind her
Neil grabs the bag and a skeleton jumps out at him
Nancy gets struck by the bladed-glove while receiving a hug

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child

jump_scares.spoiler: A man suddenly springs upwards from the bed next to Alice
There is suddenly a loud woosh sound and the camera quickly pans to an empty hallway
Alice suddenly falls through the floor while slowly walking
The camera pans around the diner back to Alice, and she is grabbed on the shoulder by a friend
There is a loud buzzing noise
The diner (a greenscreen) suddenly turns into a close-up of Daniel’s mangled face as he screams, scaring Alice
Daniel’s corpse springs back upwards
The upper half of Greta’s body appears out of the side of a rotting fridge and begins to scream
There is a sudden cut to the tower as Yvonne dives underwater that is accompanied by a loud sound effect
Yvonne reaches her hand out to Amanda, and she suddenly turns around quickly to reveal a decomposing corpse under the robe

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy’s Revenge

jump_scares.spoiler: Jesse runs away from the door and walks right into Freddy Krueger
As Jesse pours a beer, a man approaches from behind and grabs his arm
Lisa runs away from the locked door, turns around a corner and runs straight into Freddy
Freddy grabs Lisa’s face after she drops the knife
Freddy jumps out of the ground near the poolside
Lisa walks out of the car and is suddenly greeted by two human-faced dogs
Lisa stands up and spins to see Freddy right behind her
Freddy’s arm breaks through the person sitting behind Jesse and Lisa on the bus
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
The doctor turns on the lights and Belial is revealed to be hiding on the wall
Belial jumps out of the basket as it’s opened

Belial starts screaming

Accompanied by a sound effect, the scene cuts to Clare’s corpse on a rocking chair

Billy reaches out with his hand and grabs Jess’s hair
The killer appears behind a closing trunk lid
Ranger Art spits blood at the car window

Tiffany suddenly attacks the cop as he looks into the bag

There is a bolt of lightning and Chucky is suddenly sitting on the bed beside Tiffany

Warren, who was supposedly dead, suddenly jumps up out of the storage container
David knocks on the car window, startling Jade
Tiffany’s burnt face suddenly appears in the oven window

Images of the graffitied head on the wall flash up accompanied by loud noises
Candyman’s hook comes through the medicine cabinet at Helen. [Video]
Helen runs into the living room and sees Bernie’s bloodied body

As Jack peeks out of an opening, the clown suddenly appears

The clown rips through some floor boards causing Jack to scream

Andy rolls over in bed and sees Chucky right in front of him

There is a slight scare during the movie the kids are watching as a man bursts into a room holding a chainsaw
Shane turns around and sees Chucky standing on the bench
During a tense and quiet scene where Andy is walking towards Chucky, Karen suddenly walks past (the loud sound effect is very startling)
Shane is startled by Chucky while urinating
A shadow moves past in the foreground
After seeing Shane’s skinned face, Andy is startled by Chucky who says “surprise”
There is a loud crash as Gabe watches Karen on the security camera
Gabe is suddenly cut on the leg
Chucky suddenly attacks Doreen after saying “Peka-BOO!”
As Andy looks closely at the toy bear, he is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder (a few seconds later there is another slight scare as a balloon pops)
As Andy looks for Chucky, a shadow moves past in the foreground
After Chucky says “when they’re all gone”, Andy is knocked out from behind
After the Buddi song starts playing again, Andy turns around and Chucky suddenly lunges at him

The phone rings
Chucky’s head turns around suddenly and he talks to Karen
Chucky comes in to view holding a knife
A bright light turns on, moments later Chucky jumps down onto Andy

The killer suddenly walks by in the background

While the headmistress is talking, there is an abrupt very loud sound of someone opening the door that startles Owen

Mercedes wipes the steam off the mirror, revealing the killer in the background and causing her to scream

Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her

Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
A man grabs Kate from behind in the shower while she fantasizes about her husband
As the elevator door opens Kate comes face to face with a blonde woman wielding a razor
Liz glances up to see a woman watching her with binoculars and quickly get into a taxi

Liz runs frantically through a moving subway car to avoid an angry gang. As she struggles to close a door connecting two trains, a shiny razorblade appears in the window next to her head. She is grabbed and attacked

Liz emerges from the shower horrified to see someone standing just outside the bathroom door. She slowly walks to the medicine cabinet for a straight razor. Closing the mirror, the murderer appears in the reflection behind her, the film jump cuts to empty shoes, and Liz screaming

As the boy begins to drive away, Michael appears in the back seat

As Michael reaches to the door handle, a microwave sound was heard

There is a sudden growl

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
